text: hananim-i bepul-eo geudeul-i chugjeoghan jaemul-eul sayonghaneunde insaeghaehaneun geos-i geudeul-ege deo joh-eulji moleuna ohilyeo geu insaegham-i geudeul-e ge deoug saag halilaneun geos-eul saeng-gagke halila insaeghaessdeon geosdeul-i simpan ui nal geudeul-ui mog-eul joealidoda cheonjie nam-a issneun yusan-i hananim kke gwisogdoenani hananim-eun geudeul-i haenghaneun geosdeul-eul algo gyesinila
